technologies.name: WordPress
technologies.description: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system.

technologies.name: MySQL
technologies.description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: OceanWP
technologies.description: OceanWP is a fast-loading WordPress theme that has great support for third-party plugins and drag-and-drop page builders.

technologies.name: Varnish
technologies.description: Varnish is a reverse caching proxy.

technologies.name: Elementor
technologies.description: Elementor is a website builder platform for professionals on WordPress.

technologies.name: GSAP
technologies.description: GSAP is an animation library that allows you to create animations with JavaScript.

technologies.name: Yoast SEO
technologies.description: Yoast SEO is a search engine optimisation plugin for WordPress and other platforms.

technologies.name: Nginx
technologies.description: Nginx is a web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache.

technologies.name: Cloudflare
technologies.description: Cloudflare is a web-infrastructure and website-security company, providing content-delivery-network services, DDoS mitigation, Internet security, and distributed domain-name-server services.

technologies.name: Lightbox
technologies.description: Lightbox is small javascript library used to overlay images on top of the current page.

technologies.name: cdnjs
technologies.description: cdnjs is a free distributed JS library delivery service.

technologies.name: Cookie Notice
technologies.description: Cookie Notice provides a simple, customizable website banner that can be used to help your website comply with certain cookie consent requirements under the EU GDPR cookie law and CCPA regulations and includes seamless integration with Cookie Compliance to help your site comply with the latest updates to existing consent laws.

technologies.name: Pojo.me
technologies.description: Pojo.me provides a Accessibility overlay plug-in for any WordPress Theme or Page Builder.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery Migrate
technologies.description: Query Migrate is a javascript library that allows you to preserve the compatibility of your jQuery code developed for versions of jQuery older than 1.9.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Flickity
technologies.description: Flickity is a JavaScript slider library, built by David DeSandro of Metafizzy fame.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Swiper
technologies.description: Swiper is a JavaScript library that creates modern touch sliders with hardware-accelerated transitions.

technologies.name: Priority Hints
technologies.description: Priority Hints exposes a mechanism for developers to signal a relative priority for browsers to consider when fetching resources.

technologies.name: Google Font API
technologies.description: Google Font API is a web service that supports open-source font files that can be used on your web designs.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Microsoft 365
technologies.description: Microsoft 365 is a line of subscription services offered by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft Office product line.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: RSS
technologies.description: RSS is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: Module Federation
technologies.description: Module Federation is a webpack technology for dynamically loading parts of other independently deployed builds.
